channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? I am Poojan Vyas. I am a computer scientist and an engineer, currently working as an Engineer - Data & Anlytics Development at SaskTel, Regina. I have a bachelors degree in computer engineering and a masters degree in computer science. I am also pursuing to become a professional engineer in association with APEGS Canada. Hence, I currently hold the title and license of Engineer-in-Training with SaskTel. I was born in Ahmedabad, India where I have spent majority of my life.
